content: total 12 on hold ** with rs facing bring working yarn to the right of the needle gently tugging at yarn and k4 do not turn this closes the i-cord repeat from ** until the i-cord thus made measures 36 cm 14 cut yarn leaving a 20 cm tail about 8 put the next set of 4 held st on a new dpn use the tail of yarn to join the end of the i-cord to the st on the new dpn by grafting them together or with a 3-needle bind off finish securing the handle by weaving in the ends put the next 4 held st on a dpn and rejoin b yarn knit another 36 cm 14 i-cord like before and put the last 4 held st on a new dpn join the end of the i-cord to the st on dpn by grafting them together or with a 3-needle bind off secure the handle by weaving in the ends leaves make 2 or as many as you want note body of leaves is in garter stitch lobes of the leaves are in stockinette stitch set up row with col b green and 7 mm dpn co 3 st k3 turn 1 kf&b k1 kf&b 5 st turn 2 kf&b k to last st kf&b 7 st turn 3-6 repeat row 2 15 st at end of row 6 7 k14 wrap next st by bringing yarn to the front of the work slipping the next stitch and turning the work without knitting wrapped st slide wrapped stitch to right needle 8 k13 wrap next st turn 9 k12 wrap next st turn 10 k11 warp next st turn 11 k10 wrap next st turn 12 k9 warp next st turn 13 k8 wrap next st turn 14 k7 wrap next st turn 15 k6 wrap next st turn 16 k5 wrap next st turn 17 10 st on left needle 5 st on right k to end 18 k2 m1r k1 m1l k2 7 st on right needle turn 19 and all odd row from here on end p to end 20 k3 m1r k1 m1l k3 9 st on right needle turn 22 k4 m1r k1 m1l k4 11 st on right needle turn 24 k3 k2tog k1 ssk k3 9 st on right needle turn 26 k2 k2tog k1 ssk k2 7 st on right needle turn 28 k1 k2tog k1 ssk k1 5 st on right needle turn 30 k2tog k1 ssk 3 st on right needle turn 32 cdd cut yarn and bobble with rs facing join yarn and repeat from row 18 to 31 with the next 5 st on left needle cut yarn repeat again row 18 to 31 with the last 5 st do not weave in ends you can also make smaller leaves with scrap yarn and add them to the bag make sure the yarn used is non-washable and felts well felting with the high agitation cycle on
